channel.title: material on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in material on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-03
item.description: Twitter reportedly working on new feature to let users write full articles (2 minute read) Twitter Articles is a new experimental feature that will let Twitter users write longer texts.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-20
item.description: Peloton plans to launch an in-app video game where you pedal to control a rolling wheel (2 minute read) Lanebreak is Peloton’s new in-app video game that involves riders changing their cadence and resistance to meet goals and control an on-screen rolling wheel.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-21
item.description: The easiest way to start meditating is now in… Snapchat? (4 minute read) Snap Minis are small apps that are designed to be used through Snapchat’s chat function.
